title: Design a Bullish Option Token
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Design a Bullish Option Token (ERC20):
1. When creating the option token, confirm the price and exercise date of the underlying asset;
2. Issuance method (project role): Issue option tokens based on the transferred underlying asset (ETH);
3. (Optional): Option tokens can be used to create a trading pair with USDT at a lower price, simulating user purchase of options.
4. Exercise method (user role): On the expiration date, the underlying asset can be exchanged at the specified price, and the option tokens are destroyed.
5. Expiry destruction (project role): Destroy all option tokens and redeem the underlying asset.

Requirements:
1. Post your code repository link
2. Upload a screenshot of the simulated issuance and exercise process

description: Understand the concept of options in finance and try to implement options using contracts.
